channel.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
channel.description: Is there anyone here that remembers the "Red letter day" back in February? (If not, read more; [url='https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve#announcements/detail/1209451121185662422']https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve#announcements/detail/1209451121185662422[/url] I'm asking around because I'm, as the title suggests, interested in if there is interest enough to do it again. Please share your thoughts!

item.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Nobody is really interested here since we’ve got BM out and other extensions in the pipeline coming soon.

Better ask in the steamforum.

Read full topic

item.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
A few months? Episode Three got released in 2009, Gabe said so.

Read full topic

item.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
item.dc:creator: Blank
item.description:
Crypt19:

I don’t see anyone petitioning any other game developer due to their “lack of communication.”

Well, that’s why I posted a link, you take a look at that group and you’ll see it does have 60000+ members, and we already did this before, with success. And what did you mean by “episode came out a few months back”? Because it most certainly did not.

Read full topic

item.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Episode 3 came out a few months back, get with the times.

There’s seriously people that annoyed at this? Valve’s working on the next Half-Life game, they know where they want to go with the plot, it’s not the last in the Half-Life story arc, they don’t want to show anything in case it changes majorly and you’ll get more information when they’re ready to give more. What more could you want? I don’t see anyone petitioning any other game developer due to their “lack of communication.”

Read full topic

item.title: Red Letter Day Revial?
item.dc:creator: Blank
item.description:
Is there anyone here that remembers the “Red letter day” back in February? (If not, read more; https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve#announcements/detail/1209451121185662422
I’m asking around because I’m, as the title suggests, interested in if there is interest enough to do it again. Please share your thoughts!
